pilots.name: "Midnight"
pilots.ability: While you defend or perform an attack, if you have a lock on the enemy ship, that ship's dice cannot be modified.

pilots.name: "Longshot"
pilots.ability: While you perform a primary attack at attack range 3, roll 1 additional attack die.

pilots.name: "Muse"
pilots.ability: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may choose a friendly ship at range 0-1. If you do, that ship removes 1 stress token.

pilots.name: TN-3465
pilots.ability: While another friendly ship performs an attack, if you are at range 0-1 of the defender, you may suffer 1 %CRIT% damage to change 1 of the attacker's results to a %CRIT% result.

pilots.name: "Scorch"
pilots.ability: While you perform a primary attack, if you are not stressed, you may gain 1 stress token to roll 1 additional attack die.

pilots.name: "Static"
pilots.ability: While you perform a primary attack, you may spend your lock on the defender and a focus token to change all of your results to %CRIT% results.

pilots.name: Lieutenant Rivas
pilots.ability: After a ship at range 1-2 gains a red or orange token, if you do not have that ship locked, you may acquire a lock on that ship.

pilots.name: Commander Malarus
pilots.ability: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may spend 1 %CHARGE% and gain 1 stress token. If you do, until the end of the round, while you defend or perform an attack, you may change all of your %FOCUS% results to %EVADE% or %HIT% results.

pilots.name: "Null"
pilots.ability: While you are not damaged, treat your initiative value as 7.

pilots.name: Kylo Ren
pilots.ability: After you defend, you may spend 1 %FORCE% to assign the I'll Show You the Dark Side condition to the attacker. %LINEBREAK% AUTOTHRUSTERS: After you perform an action. you may perform a red %BARRELROLL% or a red %BOOST% action.

pilots.name: "Blackout"
pilots.ability: While you perform an attack, if the attack is obstructed by an obstacle, the defender rolls 2 fewer defense dice. %LINEBREAK% AUTOTHRUSTERS: After you perform an action. you may perform a red %BARRELROLL% or a red %BOOST% action.

pilots.name: "Avenger"
pilots.ability: After another friendly ship is destroyed, you may perform an action, even while stressed. %LINEBREAK% AUTOTHRUSTERS: After you perform an action. you may perform a red %BARRELROLL% or a red %BOOST% action.

pilots.name: "Recoil"
pilots.ability: While you are stressed, you may treat enemy ships in your %FRONTARC% at range 0-1 as being in your %BULLSEYEARC%. %LINEBREAK% AUTOTHRUSTERS: After you perform an action. you may perform a red %BARRELROLL% or a red %BOOST% action.

pilots.name: Sienar-Jaemus Engineer
pilots.ability: AUTOTHRUSTERS: After you perform an action. you may perform a red %BARRELROLL% or a red %BOOST% action.

pilots.name: First Order Test Pilot
pilots.ability: AUTOTHRUSTERS: After you perform an action. you may perform a red %BARRELROLL% or a red %BOOST% action.

pilots.name: Lieutenant Dormitz
pilots.ability: SETUP: After you are placed, other friendly ships can be placed anywhere in the play area at range 0-2 of you.  %LINEBREAK% LINKED BATTERY: While you perform a %CANNON% attack, roll 1 addtional die.

pilots.name: Major Stridan
pilots.ability: While you coordinate or resolve the effect of one of your upgrades, you may treat friendly ships at range 2-3 as being at range 0 or range 1. %LINEBREAK% LINKED BATTERY: While you perform a %CANNON% attack, roll 1 addtional die.

pilots.name: Petty Officer Thanisson
pilots.ability: During the Activation or Engagement Phase, after a ship in your %FRONTARC% at range 0-2 gains 1 stress token, you may spend 1 %CHARGE%. If you do, that ship gains 1 tractor token. %LINEBREAK% LINKED BATTERY: While you perform a %CANNON% attack, roll 1 addtional die.

pilots.name: Captain Cardinal
pilots.ability: While a friendly ship at range 1-2 with lower initiative than you defends or performs an attack, if you have at least 1 %CHARGE%, that ship may reroll 1 %FOCUS% result. After an enemy ship at range 0-3 is destroyed, lose 1 %CHARGE%. %LINEBREAK% LINKED BATTERY: While you perform a %CANNON% attack, roll 1 addtional die.

pilots.name: Starkiller Base Pilot
pilots.ability: LINKED BATTERY: While you perform a %CANNON% attack, roll 1 addtional die.

pilots.name: Lieutenant Tavson
pilots.ability: After you suffer damage, you may spend 1 %CHARGE% to perform an action. %LINEBREAK% LINKED BATTERY: While you perform a %CANNON% attack, roll 1 addtional die.

pilots.name: "Quickdraw"
pilots.ability: After you lose a shield, you may spend 1 %CHARGE%. If you do, you may perform a bonus primary attack. %LINEBREAK% HEAVY WEAPON TURRET: You can rotate your %SINGLETURRETARC% indicator only to your %FRONTARC% or %REARARC%. You must treat the %FRONTARC% requirement of your equipped %MISSILE% upgrades as %SINGLETURRETARC%.

pilots.name: "Backdraft"
pilots.ability: While you perform a %SINGLETURRETARC% primary attack, if the defender is in your %REARARC% roll 1 additional dice. %LINEBREAK% HEAVY WEAPON TURRET: You can rotate your %SINGLETURRETARC% indicator only to your %FRONTARC% or %REARARC%. You must treat the %FRONTARC% requirement of your equipped %MISSILE% upgrades as %SINGLETURRETARC%.

pilots.name: Zeta Squadron Survivor
pilots.ability: HEAVY WEAPON TURRET: You can rotate your %SINGLETURRETARC% indicator only to your %FRONTARC% or %REARARC%. You must treat the %FRONTARC% requirement of your equipped %MISSILE% upgrades as %SINGLETURRETARC%.

pilots.name: Omega Squadron Expert
pilots.ability: HEAVY WEAPON TURRET: You can rotate your %SINGLETURRETARC% indicator only to your %FRONTARC% or %REARARC%. You must treat the %FRONTARC% requirement of your equipped %MISSILE% upgrades as %SINGLETURRETARC%.
